Definition: Is a measure of redox capacity (analog to buffer capacity and pH).
Associated with the surfaces or pores, aggregates or grains and typically consist of oxides (manganes, iron) or carbonates.
Occurs in redoximorphic soils, is composed of Mn-Fe associations and has no internal organisation.
